statementlist.statement: select id, shortname, longname, school_id, key1, key2 from subject
insert into subject (shortname, longname, school_id, key1, key2) values (:shortname, :longname, :school_id, :key1, :key2)
select id, shortname, longname, school_id, key1, key2 from subject where school_id = :school_id and key1 = :key1
